mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Contribution to the genus Filipinolotis Miyatake, 1994 (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae, Sticholotidini)

subSubSection.paragraph: Philippines: 1 male, Mt. Polis, Lepanto, Luzon Prov., Boettcherleg (MNB); 1 female, Mt. Data, Mountain, Luzon Prov., 7500 ft, 23.iv.1946; 1 male Philippines, Luzon (ANIC).
